entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
